events.name: Virtual Reality/Augmented Reality meetup #3
events.description: The Agenda will be the same. Unless someone suggest a better one. There will be • Oculus Rift • Leap Motion • Google cardboard • 3d scanner Agenda: 1. Get to know everyone 2. Sharing topic - current state of webVR - Jia Hen http://webvr.info/ Recently I am playing with webVR, will host a session to demo webVR. 2. One day AR/VR project pitching. It can be a simple VR game, VR journalism (take a 360 video of nursing home or orphanage ) Please comment and post up your idea and start a online conversation right away. 3. Getting feedback!
events.location: #02-04, 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore
events.group_name: SGVRAR - SG Virtual Reality/Augmented Reality meetup

events.name: SG PHP Meetup (March 2015)
events.description: Venue: PayPal Singapore Address: Millenia Tower, 1 Temasek Avenue, Level 14, Singapore 039192 Topics: =========== 1) Drupal Integration with React.JS Speaker: Paul De Paula 2) Intro to Docker Speaker: Chris Heng Join Our Slack Chat! --------------------------- Also! Join our Slack Chat Group: http://slackme.phpug.sg
